00019 /*! \file
00020  * \brief A machine to gather up arbitrary frames and convert them
00021  * to raw slinear on demand.
00022  */
00023 
00024 #ifndef _ASTERISK_SLINFACTORY_H
00025 #define _ASTERISK_SLINFACTORY_H
00026 #include <stdlib.h>
00027 #include <unistd.h>
00028 #include <string.h>
00029 
00030 #if defined(__cplusplus) || defined(c_plusplus)
00031 extern "C" {
00032 #endif
00033 
00034 struct ast_slinfactory {
00035    AST_LIST_HEAD_NOLOCK(, ast_frame) queue;
00036    struct ast_trans_pvt *trans;
00037    short hold[1280];
00038    short *offset;
00039    size_t holdlen;         /*!< in samples */
00040    unsigned int size;      /*!< in samples */
00041    unsigned int format;
00042 };
00043 
00044 void ast_slinfactory_init(struct ast_slinfactory *sf);
00045 void ast_slinfactory_destroy(struct ast_slinfactory *sf);
00046 int ast_slinfactory_feed(struct ast_slinfactory *sf, struct ast_frame *f);
00047 int ast_slinfactory_read(struct ast_slinfactory *sf, short *buf, size_t samples);
00048 unsigned int ast_slinfactory_available(const struct ast_slinfactory *sf);
00049 
00050 #if defined(__cplusplus) || defined(c_plusplus)
00051 }
00052 #endif
00053 
00054 #endif /* _ASTERISK_SLINFACTORY_H */
